Summary
MyBio::Data::File::BED - Object implementing mehtods for accessing bed formatted files
Package variables
No package variables defined.
Included modules

Inherit
MyBio::_Initializable
Synopsis
    # Object that manages a bed file. 

    # To initialize 
    my $file = MyBio::Data::File::BED->new({
        TYPE            => undef,
        FILE            => undef,
        EXTRA_INFO      => undef,
    });
Description
    This object offers functions to read a bed file line by line.

Methods code
_initdescriptionprevnextTop
sub _init {
	
	my ($self,$data) = @_;
	
	$self->set_type($$data{TYPE});
	$self->set_file($$data{FILE});
	$self->set_extra($$data{EXTRA_INFO});
	
	my $read_mode = "<";
	if ($self->get_file =~ /\.gz$/) {
		$read_mode = "<:gzip";
	}
	
	my $filehandle = FileHandle->new($self->get_file, $read_mode) or die "Cannot open file\" ".$self->get_file."\"  $!";
	$self->set_filehandle($filehandle);
}
get_commentsdescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_comments {
	unless (exists $_[0]->{COMMENTS}) {
		$_[0]->set_comments();
	}
	return $_[0]->{COMMENTS};
}
get_extradescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_extra {
	return $_[0]->{EXTRA_INFO};
}
get_filedescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_file {
	return $_[0]->{FILE};
}
get_filehandledescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_filehandle {
	return $_[0]->{FILEHANDLE};
}
get_typedescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_type {
	return $_[0]->{TYPE};
}
line_to_entitydescriptionprevnextTop
sub line_to_entity {
	my ($self, $line) = @_;
	
	if ($line =~ /^chr/) {
		my ($chr,$start,$stop,$name,$score,$strand,@others) = split(/\t/,$line);
		if (@others) {
			return {
				STRAND        => $strand,
				CHR           => $chr,
				START         => $start,
				STOP          => $stop - 1, #[start,stop)
				NAME          => $name,
				SCORE         => $score,
				THICK_START   => $others[0],
				THICK_STOP    => $others[1],
				RGB           => $others[2],
				BLOCK_COUNT   => $others[3],
				BLOCK_SIZES   => $others[4],
				BLOCK_STARTS  => $others[5],
				LOCUS         => 1,
			};
		}
		else {
			return {
				STRAND        => $strand,
				CHR           => $chr,
				START         => $start,
				STOP          => $stop - 1, #[start,stop)
				NAME          => $name,
				SCORE         => $score,
				LOCUS         => 1,
			};
		}
	}
	elsif ($line =~ /^#/) {
		return {
			COMMENT_LINE => 1,
		}
	}
	elsif ($line =~ /^track/) {
		my %info;
		while ($line =~ /(\S+?)=(".+?"|\d+?)/g) {
			$info{$1} = $2;
		}
		return {
			NAME            => $info{'name'},
			DESCRIPTION     => $info{'description'},
			VISIBILITY      => $info{'visibility'},
			COLOR           => $info{'color'},
			RGB_FLAG        => $info{'itemRgb'},
			COLOR_BY_STRAND => $info{'colorByStrand'},
			USE_SCORE       => $info{'useScore'},
			TRACK_INFO      => 1,
		};
	}
	elsif ($line =~ /^browser/) {
		return {
			BROWSER         => $line,
		};
	}
	else {
		return {};
	}
}
next_entitydescriptionprevnextTop
sub next_entity {
	my ($self) = @_;
	
	while (1) {
		my $line = $self->readline or return;
		my $entity = $self->line_to_entity($line);
		if (exists $entity->{START}) {
			return $entity;
		}
		elsif (exists $entity->{COMMENT_LINE}) {
			push @{$self->get_comments}, $line;
		}
	}
}
readlinedescriptionprevnextTop
sub readline {
	my ($self) = @_;
	
	my $fh = $self->get_filehandle or return;
	my $line = <$fh>;
	chomp($line);
	return $line;
}
set_commentsdescriptionprevnextTop
sub set_comments {
	if (defined $_[1]) {
		$_[0]->{COMMENTS} = $_[1]
	}
	else {
		$_[0]->{COMMENTS} = [];
	}
}
set_extradescriptionprevnextTop
sub set_extra {
	$_[0]->{EXTRA_INFO}=$_[1] if defined $_[1];
}
set_filedescriptionprevnextTop
sub set_file {
	$_[0]->{FILE}=$_[1] if defined $_[1];
}
set_filehandledescriptionprevnextTop
sub set_filehandle {
	$_[0]->{FILEHANDLE}=$_[1] if defined $_[1];
}
set_typedescriptionprevnextTop
sub set_type {
	$_[0]->{TYPE}=$_[1] if defined $_[1];
}

    # Read one line

    my %entity = %{$bed_obj->read_entity()};
